Table of Contents

Interface IMergedFileService

Namespace
MdFilesMerger.App.Abstract
Assembly
MdFilesMerger.App.dll

Interface with methods for handling collection of IMergedFile objects.

Inheritance: IService<T> -> ICRUDService<T> -> IDirectoryService<T> -> IEditFileService<T> -> IMergedFileService
Implementations: MergedFileService 

public interface IMergedFileService : IEditFileService<IMergedFile>, IDirectoryService<IMergedFile>, ICRUDService<IMergedFile>, IService<IMergedFile>
Inherited Members

Methods

AppendTableOfContents(FileInfo, int, List<ISelectedFile>)

Appends the table of contents at the end of the file.

void AppendTableOfContents(FileInfo destinationFile, int mergedFileId, List<ISelectedFile> selectedFiles)

Parameters

destinationFile FileInfo

The destination file, where table of contents text will be added.

mergedFileId int

The identifier of the merged file associated with destinationFile.

selectedFiles List<ISelectedFile>

The list of all selected files that will be merged into the merged file. It is used to create table of contents.

See Also

IService<T>
MergedFileService
IMergedFile

CreateFile(int)

Creates the file associated with specified object.

FileInfo? CreateFile(int id)

Parameters

id int

The identifier of the object associated with the merged file to create.

Returns

FileInfo

FileInfo of created file or null if no file was specified, or specified file couldn't be created.

Remarks

If the file already exists, it is deleted. New file is created and fill with specified header.

ReadByUserId(int)

Gets, from the stored collection of objects, elements with the specified user identifier.

List<IMergedFile> ReadByUserId(int userId)

Parameters

userId int

The searched user identifier.

Returns

List<IMergedFile>

The list of objects with the specified user identifier. If there is no objects with equal userId, returned list is empty.

UpdateFileName(int, string)

Updates the name of the file associated with specified object.

int UpdateFileName(int id, string fileName)

Parameters

id int

The identifier of merged file to update.

fileName string

New name of the associated .md file. It doesn't have to include extension.

Returns

int

The identifier of updated object or -1, if there is no with specified id in the stored collection or fileName is not a valid file name.

int UpdateNewLineStyle(int id, string newLineStyle)

Parameters

newLineStyle string

int

The identifier of updated object or -1, if there is no with specified id in the stored collection.

int UpdateParentDirectory(int id, string directoryPath)

Parameters

The identifier of merged file to update.

directoryPath string

The new directory path.

Returns

int

The identifier of updated object or -1, if there is no with specified id in the stored collection or directoryPath is not a valid path.

Parameters
